lines.text: Who in the hell taught you how to drive, Bustis?
Same woman that taught me to screw.
You hear that, Long John? Come Saturday night Mary Lou is gonna be free.
Certainly not free, Bustis, but, eh, definitely not expensive.
Annie, you know I'm as upright as a tombstone.
Give me a beer in the can.
I can't take it to you in the can, you'll have to drink it here.
John can slice pie all long, if you know what I mean, Mary Lou.
I was never so surprised in all my life! Two handsome boys like that, kissing! What a waste.
They musta had some Yankee blood in 'em. I can't imagine a couple of real Southern boys carrying on that way.
Come on, take your clothes off.
Eh... uh, buh... look... eh... tell me, ha- have you had a medical examination recently?

[ironic]
Would you like your family doctor to examine me?
